description: Number of real roots of x - x^3/3! + x^5/5! - ... + (-1)^n*x^(2n+1)/(2n+1)!.
references: _James Propp_, posting to math-fun mailing list May 30 1997.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
maple: Digits := 25: t1 := 0: for k from 1 by 2 to 51 do t1 := t1+(-1)^( (k-1)/2 )*x^k/k!; print(nops([ fsolve(t1*k!) ])); od:
mathematica: f[n_] := Sum[ (-1)^k*x^(2k+1)/(2k+1)!, {k, 0, n}]; a[n_] := CountRoots[f[n], x]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 62}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 13 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
